Restrictions

Result instances often need to access attributes from the corresponding model instance. Fitting a model multiple times with different arguments can change model attributes. This means that the result instance may no longer point to the correct model attributes after the model has been re-fit.
trans-unit.target: 结果实例经常需要从对应的模型实例中访问属性。用不同的参数多次拟合一个模型会改变模型属性。这意味着在模型被重新拟合后,结果实例可能不再指向正确的模型属性。

trans-unit.source: Since the data was differenced, the estimated factor explains the variation in the differenced data, not the original data.
trans-unit.target: 由于数据是经过差分的,估计的因子解释了差分数据的变化,而不是原始数据。

trans-unit.source: Since there is no autoregressive component, this model can be fit using the MarkovRegression class. Since there is no mean effect, we specify trend='nc'. There are hypotheized to be three regimes for the switching variances, so we specify k_regimes=3 and switching_variance=True (by default, the variance is assumed to be the same across regimes).
trans-unit.target: 由于没有自回归组件，因此可以使用 MarkovRegression 类来拟合此模型。由于没有平均影响，因此我们指定了 trend='nc' 。假设存在三种切换方差的机制，因此我们指定 k_regimes=3 和switch_variance switching_variance=True （默认情况下，假设各机制的方差相同）。

Statsmodels MixedLM handles most non-crossed random effects models, and some crossed models. To include crossed random effects in a model, it is necessary to treat the entire dataset as a single group. The variance components arguments to the model can then be used to define models with various combinations of crossed and non-crossed random effects.

trans-unit.source: Substantive motivation and model

Such a collection may arise by stratifying a single 2x2 table with respect to another factor. This class implements the ‘Cochran-Mantel-Haenszel’ and ‘Breslow-Day’ procedures for analyzing collections of 2x2 contingency tables.
trans-unit.target: 通过将单个2x2表相对于另一个因素进行分层可以产生这样的集合。此类实施“ Cochran-Mantel-Haenszel”和“ Breslow-Day”过程来分析2x2列联表的集合。

trans-unit.source: Sum (Deviation) Coding

Sum coding compares the mean of the dependent variable for a given level to the overall mean of the dependent variable over all the levels. That is, it uses contrasts between each of the first k-1 levels and level k In this example, level 1 is compared to all the others, level 2 to all the others, and level 3 to all the others.
trans-unit.target: 总和编码将某一级别的因变量的平均值与所有级别的因变量的总平均值进行比较。也就是说,它利用前k-1个层次和层次k之间的对比 在本例中,层次1与其他所有层次比较,层次2与其他所有层次比较,层次3与其他所有层次比较。

trans-unit.source: Suppose our data are student test scores, and the students are in classrooms, nested in schools, nested in school districts. The school district is the highest level of grouping, so the school district id would be provided to GEE as groups, and the school and classroom id’s would be provided to the Nested class as the dep_data argument, e.g.
trans-unit.target: 假设我们的数据是学生考试成绩，并且学生在教室里，学校里，学校区里。学区是分组的最高级别，因此将学区ID作为 groups 提供给GEE ，并将学校和教室ID作为 dep_data 参数提供给Nested类。

trans-unit.source: Suppose the input data has N points. The algorithm works by estimating the smooth y_i by taking the frac*N closest points to (x_i,y_i) based on their x values and estimating y_i using a weighted linear regression. The weight for (x_j,y_j) is tricube function applied to abs(x_i-x_j).
trans-unit.target: 假设输入数据有N个点。该算法的工作原理是，根据fac * N最接近的点基于它们的x值来估计（x_i，y_i）的 smooth 点y_i，然后使用加权线性回归估计y_i。（x_j，y_j）的权重是应用于abs（x_i-x_j）的三角函数。

trans-unit.source: Suppose we have data from an educational study with students nested in classrooms nested in schools. The students take a test, and we want to relate the test scores to the students’ ages, while accounting for the effects of classrooms and schools. The school will be the top-level group, and the classroom is a nested group that is specified as a variance component. Note that the schools may have different number of classrooms, and the classroom labels may (but need not be) different across the schools.

trans-unit.source: Test for Granger-causality as described in chapter 7.6.3 of [1]. Test H0: “causing does not Granger-cause the remaining variables of the system” against H1: “causing is Granger-causal for the remaining variables”.
trans-unit.target: 如[1]的第7.6.3章所述测试格兰杰因果关系。针对H1：测试H0：“ causing 不是格兰杰原因的系统剩余变量”：“ causing 剩余变量是Granger的原因”。

trans-unit.source: Test that the probability of success is the same for each treatment. The alternative is that at least two treatments have a different probability of success.
trans-unit.target: 检验每种治疗的成功概率是否相同。另一种情况是,至少有两种治疗的成功概率不同。

trans-unit.source: Tests whether the sum-of-squares in the first third of the sample is significantly different than the sum-of-squares in the last third of the sample. Analogous to a Goldfeld-Quandt test. The null hypothesis is of no heteroskedasticity.

trans-unit.source: The “-” sign can be used to remove columns/variables. For instance, we can remove the intercept from a model by:
trans-unit.target: “-”号可用于删除列/变量。例如，我们可以通过以下方式从模型中删除拦截：

trans-unit.source: The “robust” covariance type is the standard “sandwich estimator” (e.g. Liang and Zeger (1986)). It is the default here and in most other packages. The “naive” estimator gives smaller standard errors, but is only correct if the working correlation structure is correctly specified. The “bias reduced” estimator of Mancl and DeRouen (Biometrics, 2001) reduces the downard bias of the robust estimator.
trans-unit.target: “稳健”协方差类型是标准的“三明治估计量”（例如Liang和Zeger（1986））。这是此处和大多数其他软件包中的默认设置。“幼稚”的估算器提供较小的标准误差，但仅在正确指定了工作相关结构的情况下才是正确的。Mancl和DeRouen的“偏倚减少”估算器（Biometrics，2001年）减少了稳健估算器的下行偏差。

trans-unit.source: The ‘basinhopping’ solver ignores maxiter, retall, full_output explicit arguments.
trans-unit.target: “ basinhopping”求解器将忽略 maxiter ， retall ， full_output 显式参数。

trans-unit.source: The ‘beta’ and ‘jeffreys’ interval are central, they use alpha/2 in each tail, and alpha is not adjusted at the boundaries. In the extreme case when count is zero or equal to nobs, then the coverage will be only 1 - alpha/2 in the case of ‘beta’.
trans-unit.target: “ beta”和“ jeffreys”间隔处于中心位置，它们在每条尾巴中使用alpha / 2，并且未在边界处调整alpha。在极端情况下，当 count 为零或等于 nobs 时，则在“ beta”的情况下，覆盖率将仅为1-alpha / 2。

trans-unit.source: The ‘fdr_gbs’ procedure is not verified against another package, p-values are derived from scratch and are not derived in the reference. In Monte Carlo experiments the method worked correctly and maintained the false discovery rate.
trans-unit.target: 'fdr_gbs'过程未针对另一个软件包进行验证，p值是从头开始得出的，而不是在参考文献中得出的。在蒙特卡洛实验中，该方法正确运行并保持了错误发现率。

trans-unit.source: The (i,j)th element of this matrix is the probability of transitioning from regime j to regime i; thus the previous regime is represented in a column and the next regime is represented by a row.
trans-unit.target: 该矩阵的(i,j)个元素是指从制度j过渡到制度i的概率;因此,上一个制度用一列表示,下一个制度用一行表示。

trans-unit.source: The VAR class assumes that the passed time series are stationary. Non-stationary or trending data can often be transformed to be stationary by first-differencing or some other method. For direct analysis of non-stationary time series, a standard stable VAR(p) model is not appropriate.
trans-unit.target: 该 VAR 类假定通过时间序列是静止的。非平稳或趋势数据通常可以通过一阶微分或其他方法转换为平稳数据。对于非平稳时间序列的直接分析，标准的稳定VAR（p）模型不合适。

The ‘standard’ formulas are:
The DynamicFactor class is another example of a multivariate statespace model.
trans-unit.target: 所述 DynamicFactor 类是一个多变量模型状态空间的另一实例。

trans-unit.source: The FilterResults class not only holds a frozen representation of the state space model (the design, transition, etc. matrices, as well as model dimensions, etc.) but it also holds the filtering output, including the filtered state and loglikelihood (see the class documentation for the full list of available results). It also provides a predict method, which allows in-sample prediction or out-of-sample forecasting. A similar method, predict, provides additional prediction or forecasting results, including confidence intervals.
trans-unit.target: 所述 FilterResults 类不仅保持该状态空间模型的冻结表示（设计，过渡等基质，以及模型尺寸等），但它也保持滤波输出，包括 filtered state 和对数似然（见类文档以获取可用结果的完整列表）。它还提供了一种 predict 方法，允许进行样本内预测或样本外预测。相似的方法 predict 提供其他预测或预测结果，包括置信区间。

trans-unit.source: The GenericLikelihoodModel class eases the process by providing tools such as automatic numeric differentiation and a unified interface to scipy optimization functions. Using statsmodels, users can fit new MLE models simply by "plugging-in" a log-likelihood function.
trans-unit.target: 所述 GenericLikelihoodModel 类简化通过提供工具，如自动数字分化和一个统一的接口的过程 scipy 优化功能。使用 statsmodels ，用户可以简单地通过“插入”日志似然函数来适应新的MLE模型。

trans-unit.source: The KalmanFilter class is a subclass of Representation that provides filtering capabilities. Once the state space representation matrices have been constructed, the filter method can be called, producing a FilterResults instance; FilterResults is a subclass of FrozenRepresentation.
trans-unit.target: 在 KalmanFilter 类是表示，其提供过滤能力的子类。一旦构造了状态空间表示矩阵，就可以调用 filter 方法，生成一个 FilterResults 实例； FilterResults 是 FrozenRepresentation 的子类。

trans-unit.source: The KalmanSmoother class is a subclass of KalmanFilter that provides smoothing capabilities. Once the state space representation matrices have been constructed, the filter method can be called, producing a SmootherResults instance; SmootherResults is a subclass of FilterResults.
trans-unit.target: 该 KalmanSmoother 类的子类 KalmanFilter ，提供平滑的能力。一旦构造了状态空间表示矩阵，就可以调用 filter 方法，从而生成 SmootherResults 实例； SmootherResults 是 FilterResults 的子类。

trans-unit.source: The RLS class allows computation of recursive residuals and computes CUSUM and CUSUM of squares statistics. Plotting these statistics along with reference lines denoting statistically significant deviations from the null hypothesis of stable parameters allows an easy visual indication of parameter stability.
trans-unit.target: 该 RLS 类允许递归残差计算，并计算累积和和的平方统计CUSUM。将这些统计信息与参考线一起标出，这些参考线表示与稳定参数的零假设在统计上的显着偏差，可以轻松直观地看到参数稳定性。

trans-unit.source: The Representation class is the piece where the state space model representation is defined. In simple terms, it holds the state space matrices (design, obs_intercept, etc.; see the introduction to state space models, above) and allows their manipulation.
trans-unit.target: 的 Representation 类是其中状态空间模型表示被定义的一块。简单来说，它保存状态空间矩阵（ design ， obs_intercept 等；请参见上面的状态空间模型简介）并允许对其进行操作。

trans-unit.source: The SARIMAX class is an example of a fully fledged model created using the statespace backend for estimation. SARIMAX can be used very similarly to tsa models, but works on a wider range of models by adding the estimation of additive and multiplicative seasonal effects, as well as arbitrary trend polynomials.
trans-unit.target: 所述 SARIMAX 类是使用用于估计状态空间后端创建的完全成熟的模型的一个例子。 SARIMAX 可以与tsa模型非常相似地使用，但是可以通过添加相加和相乘季节效应的估计以及任意趋势多项式来在更广泛的模型上使用。

trans-unit.source: The SmootherResults class holds all the output from FilterResults, but also includes smoothing output, including the smoothed state and loglikelihood (see the class documentation for the full list of available results). Whereas “filtered” output at time t refers to estimates conditional on observations up through time t, “smoothed” output refers to estimates conditional on the entire set of observations in the dataset.
trans-unit.target: 该 SmootherResults 类包含所有从输出 FilterResults ，而且还包括平滑输出，包括 smoothed state 和对数似然（见可用结果的完整列表类的文档）。而在时间“过滤”输出 t 是指估计上观察了有条件通过时间 t ，“平滑”输出是指估计上的整组数据集中观察的条件。

trans-unit.source: The Spector dataset is distributed with statsmodels. You can access a vector of values for the dependent variable (endog) and a matrix of regressors (exog) like this:
trans-unit.target: 该 Spector 数据集被分布与 statsmodels 。您可以像这样访问因变量的值向量（ endog ）和回归矩阵（ exog ）：

trans-unit.source: The UnobservedComponents class is another example of a statespace model.
trans-unit.target: 所述 UnobservedComponents 类是一个状态空间模型的另一实例。

trans-unit.source: The VARMAX class in Statsmodels allows estimation of VAR, VMA, and VARMA models (through the order argument), optionally with a constant term (via the trend argument). Exogenous regressors may also be included (as usual in Statsmodels, by the exog argument), and in this way a time trend may be added. Finally, the class allows measurement error (via the measurement_error argument) and allows specifying either a diagonal or unstructured innovation covariance matrix (via the error_cov_type argument).
trans-unit.target: VARMAX 中的VARMAX类允许估计VAR，VMA和VARMA模型（通过 order 参数），还可以选择使用常数项（通过 trend 参数）。也可以包括外源回归变量（如Statsmodels中通常一样，通过 exog 参数），这样可以添加时间趋势。最后，该类允许测量误差（通过 measurement_error 参数），并允许指定对角线或非结构化创新协方差矩阵（通过 error_cov_type 参数）。

trans-unit.source: The VARMAX class is an example of a multivariate statespace model.
trans-unit.target: 所述 VARMAX 类是一个多变量模型状态空间的一个例子。

trans-unit.source: The goodman method [2] is based on approximating a statistic based on the multinomial as a chi-squared random variable. The usual recommendation is that this is valid if all the values in counts are greater than or equal to 5. There is no condition on the number of categories for this method.
trans-unit.target: 该 goodman 方法[2]是基于近似基于该多项式作为卡方随机变量的统计信息。通常的建议是，如果 counts 中的所有值都大于或等于5，则此方法有效。此方法的类别数量没有条件。

trans-unit.source: The n x n covariance matrix of the error terms: \(\mu\sim N\left(0,\Sigma\right)\).
trans-unit.target: 误差项的 n x n 协方差矩阵：\（\ mu \ sim N \ left（0，\ Sigma \ right）\）。

trans-unit.source: The n x n upper triangular matrix \(\Psi^{T}\) that satisfies \(\Psi\Psi^{T}=\Sigma^{-1}\).
trans-unit.target: 满足\（\ Psi \ Psi ^ {T} = \ Sigma ^ {-1} \）的 n x n 上三角矩阵\（\ Psi ^ {T} \）。

trans-unit.source: The order argument is a tuple of the form (AR specification, Integration order, MA specification). The integration order must be an integer (for example, here we assumed one order of integration, so it was specified as 1. In a pure ARMA model where the underlying data is already stationary, it would be 0).
trans-unit.target: 的 order 参数是以下形式的元组 (AR specification, Integration order, MA specification) 。积分顺序必须是整数（例如，在此假设一个积分顺序，因此将其指定为1。在基础数据已经固定的纯ARMA模型中，该数值将为0）。

trans-unit.source: The p x n Moore-Penrose pseudoinverse of the whitened design matrix. It is approximately equal to \(\left(X^{T}\Sigma^{-1}X\right)^{-1}X^{T}\Psi\), where \(\Psi\) is defined such that \(\Psi\Psi^{T}=\Sigma^{-1}\).
trans-unit.target: 白色设计矩阵的 p x n Moore-Penrose伪逆。它大约等于\（\ left（X ^ {T} \ Sigma ^ {-1} X \ right）^ {-1} X ^ {T} \ Psi \），其中\（\ Psi \）被定义这样\（\ Psi \ Psi ^ {T} = \ Sigma ^ {-1} \）。

trans-unit.target: 该 perturb_params 方法必须首先调用来定义模型。

trans-unit.source: The plot_components method of the fit object can be used to show plots and confidence intervals of each of the estimated states, as well as a plot of the observed data versus the one-step-ahead predictions of the model to assess fit.
trans-unit.target: 拟合对象的 plot_components 方法可用于显示每个估计状态的图和置信区间，以及观察到的数据与模型的一步一步预测之间的关系图，以评估拟合。

trans-unit.source: The power module currently implements power and sample size calculations for the t-tests, normal based test, F-tests and Chisquare goodness of fit test. The implementation is class based, but the module also provides three shortcut functions, tt_solve_power, tt_ind_solve_power and zt_ind_solve_power to solve for any one of the parameters of the power equations.
trans-unit.target: 该 power 模块目前实现功率和样本大小计算为t检验，正常的基于测试，F测试和配合测试的卡方优度。该实现是基于类的，但是该模块还提供了三个快捷函数 tt_solve_power ， tt_ind_solve_power 和 zt_ind_solve_power 来求解幂方程的任何一个参数。

trans-unit.source: The predict command is first applied here to get in-sample predictions. We use the full_results=True argument to allow us to calculate confidence intervals (the default output of predict is just the predicted values).
trans-unit.target: 该 predict 命令首先应用在这里拿到样品中的预测值。我们使用 full_results=True 参数来允许我们计算置信区间（ predict 的默认输出就是预测值）。

trans-unit.source: The regression method follows the Stata definition. Method bartlett and regression are verified against Stats. Two inofficial methods, ‘ols’ and ‘gls’, produce similar factor scores but are not verified.
trans-unit.target: 的 regression 方法遵循Stata的定义。方法bartlett和回归均已根据Stats进行了验证。两种非正式方法“ ols”和“ gls”产生相似的因子得分，但未经验证。

trans-unit.source: The sison-glaz method [3] approximates the multinomial probabilities, and evaluates that with a maximum-likelihood estimator. The first approximation is an Edgeworth expansion that converges when the number of categories goes to infinity, and the maximum-likelihood estimator converges when the number of observations (sum(counts)) goes to infinity. In their paper, Sison & Glaz demo their method with at least 7 categories, so len(counts) >= 7 with all values in counts at or above 5 can be used as a rule of thumb for the validity of this method. This method is less conservative than the goodman method (i.e. it will yield confidence intervals closer to the desired significance level), but produces confidence intervals of uniform width over all categories (except when the intervals reach 0 or 1, in which case they are truncated), which makes it most useful when proportions are of similar magnitude.
trans-unit.target: 所述 sison-glaz 方法[3]近似多项式概率，并评价为具有最大似然估计。第一个近似值是Edgeworth展开，当类别数达到无穷大时收敛，而最大似然估计量在观察数（ sum(counts) 达到无穷大时收敛。在他们的论文，西逊＆Glaz演示与至少7类，因此它们的方法 len(counts) >= 7 与所有值 counts 等于或高于5可作为拇指的该方法的有效性的规则。这种方法不如 goodman 保守 方法（即产生的置信区间更接近所需的显着性水平），但在所有类别上均产生宽度均等的置信区间（除非区间达到0或1，在这种情况下将其截断），这在以下情况下最有用比例大小相似。

trans-unit.source: The start_paramsupdate method must be overridden in the child class (and the transform and untransform methods, if needed).
trans-unit.target: 该 start_params update 方法必须重写在子类（和 transform 和 untransform 方法，如果需要的话）。

trans-unit.source: The statsmodels.api.SurvfuncRight class can be used to estimate a survival function using data that may be right censored. SurvfuncRight implements several inference procedures including confidence intervals for survival distribution quantiles, pointwise and simultaneous confidence bands for the survival function, and plotting procedures. The duration.survdiff function provides testing procedures for comparing survival distributions.
trans-unit.target: 所述 statsmodels.api.SurvfuncRight 类可以被用来估计使用可以右删失数据的生存函数。 SurvfuncRight 实现了几种推理过程，包括生存分布分位数的置信区间，生存函数的点状和同时置信带以及绘图过程。该 duration.survdiff 功能提供测试程序比较生存分布。

trans-unit.target: 该 statsmodels.stats.Table 是与应急表工作的最基本的类。我们可以直接从任何包含列联表单元格计数的矩形阵列对象创建 Table 对象：

trans-unit.source: The statsmodels generic MLE and R parameter estimates agree up to the fourth decimal. The standard errors, however, agree only up to the second decimal. This discrepancy is the result of imprecision in our Hessian numerical estimates. In the current context, the difference between MASS and statsmodels standard error estimates is substantively irrelevant, but it highlights the fact that users who need very precise estimates may not always want to rely on default settings when using numerical derivatives. In such cases, it is better to use analytical derivatives with the LikelihoodModel class.
trans-unit.target: 该 statsmodels 通用MLE和 R 参数估计同意到第四小数。但是，标准误只能达到小数点后第二位。这种差异是我们的Hessian数值估算结果不精确的结果。在当前情况下， MASS 和 statsmodels 标准误差估计值之间的差异基本上无关紧要，但是它突出了以下事实：需要非常精确的估计值的用户在使用数值导数时可能并不总是希望依赖默认设置。在这种情况下，最好将分析导数与 LikelihoodModel 类一起使用。

trans-unit.source: The Baxter-King filter is intended to explictly deal with the periodicty of the business cycle. By applying their band-pass filter to a series, they produce a new series that does not contain fluctuations at higher or lower than those of the business cycle. Specifically, the BK filter takes the form of a symmetric moving average
trans-unit.target: Baxter-King滤波器旨在明确处理商业周期的周期性问题。通过将其带通滤波器应用于一个序列,他们产生了一个不包含高于或低于商业周期波动的新序列。具体来说,BK滤波器采用对称移动平均线的形式。

trans-unit.source: The CCPR plot provides a way to judge the effect of one regressor on the
trans-unit.target: CCPR图提供了一种方法来判断一个回归因子对以下因素的影响。

trans-unit.source: The CCPR plot provides a way to judge the effect of one regressor on the response variable by taking into account the effects of the other independent variables. The partial residuals plot is defined as Residuals + B_i*X_i versus X_i. The component adds the B_i*X_i versus X_i to show where the fitted line would lie. Care should be taken if X_i is highly correlated with any of the other independent variables. If this is the case, the variance evident in the plot will be an underestimate of the true variance.
trans-unit.target: CCPR图提供了一种通过考虑其他独立变量的影响来判断一个回归因子对响应变量的影响的方法。部分残差图定义为残差+B_i*X_i与X_i。分量加上B_i*X_i与X_i,以显示拟合线的位置。如果X_i与任何其他独立变量高度相关,则应注意。如果是这种情况,图中明显的方差将是真实方差的低估。

trans-unit.source: The Jarque-Bera test statistic tests the null that the data is normally distributed against an alternative that the data follow some other distribution. The test statistic is based on two moments of the data, the skewness, and the kurtosis, and has an asymptotic \(\chi^2_2\) distribution.
trans-unit.target: Jarque-Bera检验统计量检验数据是正态分布的零点,而不是数据遵循其他分布的另一种选择。检验统计是基于数据的两个矩,即偏度和峰度,并具有渐进式分布(chi^2_2/)。

The Kalman filter is a recursive algorithm that may in some cases suffer issues with numerical stability. The stability method controls what, if any, measures are taken to promote stability.
trans-unit.target: 卡尔曼滤波器是一种递归算法,在某些情况下可能存在数值稳定性问题。稳定性方法控制采取什么措施(如果有的话)来促进稳定性。

trans-unit.source: The Kalman filter may contain one matrix inversion: that of the forecast error covariance matrix. The inversion method controls how and if that inverse is performed.
trans-unit.target: 卡尔曼滤波器可能包含一个矩阵反演:预测误差协方差矩阵的反演。反演方法控制如何以及是否进行反演。

The LAD model is a special case of quantile regression where q=0.5
trans-unit.target: LAD模型是分位数回归的特殊情况,其中q=0.

trans-unit.source: The Least Absolute Deviation (LAD) estimator is a special case where quantile is set to 0.5 (q argument of the fit method).
trans-unit.target: 最小绝对偏差(LAD)估计器是一种特殊情况,其中分位数被设置为0.5(拟合方法的q参数)。

trans-unit.source: The Local Linear Trend model has the form (see Durbin and Koopman 2012, Chapter 3.2 for all notation and details):
trans-unit.target: 本地线性趋势模型的形式(所有的符号和细节见Durbin和Koopman 2012年,第3.2章)。

trans-unit.source: The Longley dataset is a time series dataset:
trans-unit.target: Longley数据集是一个时间序列数据集。

trans-unit.source: The Longley dataset is well known to have high multicollinearity. That is, the exogenous predictors are highly correlated. This is problematic because it can affect the stability of our coefficient estimates as we make minor changes to model specification.
trans-unit.target: 众所周知,Longley数据集具有很高的多关联性。也就是说,外生预测因素高度相关。这是有问题的,因为当我们对模型规格进行微小的改变时,它可能会影响我们系数估计的稳定性。

trans-unit.source: The MICE module allows most Statsmodels models to be fit to a dataset with missing values on the independent and/or dependent variables, and provides rigorous standard errors for the fitted parameters. The basic idea is to treat each variable with missing values as the dependent variable in a regression, with some or all of the remaining variables as its predictors. The MICE procedure cycles through these models, fitting each in turn, then uses a procedure called “predictive mean matching” (PMM) to generate random draws from the predictive distributions determined by the fitted models. These random draws become the imputed values for one imputed data set.
trans-unit.target: MICE模块允许大多数Statsmodels模型拟合到在自变量和/或因变量上缺少值的数据集，并为拟合的参数提供严格的标准误差。基本思想是将具有缺失值的每个变量视为回归中的因变量，而将其余部分或全部变量作为其预测变量。MICE过程在这些模型之间循环，依次进行拟合，然后使用称为“预测均值匹配”（PMM）的过程从由拟合模型确定的预测分布中生成随机抽取。这些随机抽取成为一个估算数据集的估算值。

trans-unit.source: The Median Absolute Deviation along given axis of an array
trans-unit.target: 阵列沿给定轴的绝对偏差中值

trans-unit.source: The Null hypothesis for grangercausalitytests is that the time series in the second column, x2, does NOT Granger cause the time series in the first column, x1. Grange causality means that past values of x2 have a statistically significant effect on the current value of x1, taking past values of x1 into account as regressors. We reject the null hypothesis that x2 does not Granger cause x1 if the pvalues are below a desired size of the test.
trans-unit.target: Grangercausalitytests的Null假设是:第二列中的时间序列x2不对第一列中的时间序列x1产生格兰杰原因。格兰杰因果关系是指在将x1的过去值作为回归因子考虑在内的情况下,x2的过去值对x1的当前值有统计学上的显著影响。如果p值低于检验所需的大小,我们拒绝x2不格兰杰引起x1的零假设。

trans-unit.source: The Null hypothesis is that the regression is correctly modeled as linear.
trans-unit.target: Null假设是:回归正确建模为线性。

trans-unit.source: The Null hypothesis is that the regression is correctly modelled as linear. The alternative for which the power might be large are convex, check
trans-unit.target: Null假设是回归正确建模为线性。对于可能功率较大的备选方案是凸型,查一下

trans-unit.source: The Null hypothesis is that the variance in the two sub-samples are the same. The alternative hypothesis, can be increasing, i.e. the variance in the second sample is larger than in the first, or decreasing or two-sided.
trans-unit.target: 空心假设是,两个子样本的方差是相同的。备选假设,可以是递增,即第二个样本的方差大于第一个样本的方差,也可以是递减或两边。

trans-unit.source: The Null hypothesis is that there is no cointegration, the alternative hypothesis is that there is cointegrating relationship. If the pvalue is small, below a critical size, then we can reject the hypothesis that there is no cointegrating relationship.
trans-unit.target: Null假设是不存在协整关系,替代假设是存在协整关系。如果p值很小,低于临界值,那么我们就可以拒绝不存在协整关系的假设。

trans-unit.source: The Null hypothesis of the test is that all treatments have the same effect.
trans-unit.target: 检验的Null假设是所有的处理都有相同的效果。

The SARIMA model is specified \((p, d, q) \times (P, D, Q)_s\).
The Statsmodels LME framework currently supports post-estimation inference via Wald tests and confidence intervals on the coefficients, profile likelihood analysis, likelihood ratio testing, and AIC.
trans-unit.target: Statsmodels LME框架目前支持通过Wald检验和系数的置信区间、剖面似然分析、似然比检验和AIC进行估计后推断。

trans-unit.source: The Statsmodels implementation of LME is primarily group-based, meaning that random effects must be independently-realized for responses in different groups. There are two types of random effects in our implementation of mixed models: (i) random coefficients (possibly vectors) that have an unknown covariance matrix, and (ii) random coefficients that are independent draws from a common univariate distribution. For both (i) and (ii), the random effects influence the conditional mean of a group through their matrix/vector product with a group-specific design matrix.
trans-unit.target: LME的Statsmodels实现主要是基于群体的,这意味着随机效应必须对不同群体的反应进行独立实现。在我们实现混合模型的过程中,有两种类型的随机效应。(i)具有未知协方差矩阵的随机系数(可能是向量),(ii)从一个共同的单变量分布中独立抽取的随机系数。对于(i)和(ii),随机效应通过它们与特定群体设计矩阵的矩阵/向量乘积影响群体的条件均值。

trans-unit.source: The Statsmodels imputation of linear mixed models (MixedLM) closely follows the approach outlined in Lindstrom and Bates (JASA 1988). This is also the approach followed in the R package LME4. Other packages such as Stata, SAS, etc. should also be consistent with this approach, as the basic techniques in this area are mostly mature.
trans-unit.target: 线性混合模型(MixedLM)的Statsmodels估算方法密切遵循Lindstrom和Bates(JASA 1988)概述的方法。这也是R包LME4所遵循的方法。其他软件包如Stata、SAS等也应与此方法保持一致,因为该领域的基本技术大多已经成熟。

trans-unit.target: Tweedie分布对表中未列出的/(p=0,1,2/)有特殊情况,并使用/(alpha=frac{p-2}{p-1}/)。

The autocorrelation function
The autocorrelation parameter is estimated using weighted nonlinear least squares, regressing each value within a cluster on each preceeding value in the same cluster.
trans-unit.target: 自相关参数采用加权非线性最小二乘法估计,将一个簇内的每个值与同一簇内的每个前值进行回归。

trans-unit.source: The calculations for this dependence structure involve all pairs of observations within a group (that is, within the top level group structure passed to GEE). Large group sizes will result in slow iterations.
trans-unit.target: 此依存结构的计算涉及组内（即，传递给GEE 的顶层 group 结构内）的所有观察对。大的小组规模将导致缓慢的迭代。

trans-unit.source: The calculations use the fact that if k is known, then X can be determined from the eigen-decomposition of cov - k*I, which can in turn be easily obtained form the eigen-decomposition of cov. Thus the problem can be reduced to a 1-dimensional search for k that does not require repeated eigen-decompositions.
trans-unit.target: 计算使用以下事实：如果k已知，则可以根据cov的本征分解确定k-k * I，这又可以通过 cov 的本征分解轻松获得。因此，可以将问题减少为不需要重复特征分解的k的一维搜索。

trans-unit.source: The coefficients taken on by polynomial coding for k=4 levels are the linear, quadratic, and cubic trends in the categorical variable. The categorical variable here is assumed to be represented by an underlying, equally spaced numeric variable. Therefore, this type of encoding is used only for ordered categorical variables with equal spacing. In general, the polynomial contrast produces polynomials of order k-1. Since race is not an ordered factor variable let's use read as an example. First we need to create an ordered categorical from read.
trans-unit.target: 通过多项式编码得出的 k=4 级的系数是分类变量中的线性，二次和三次趋势。此处假定类别变量由基本等距的数字变量表示。因此，这种类型的编码仅用于具有相等间距的有序分类变量。通常，多项式对比产生阶数为 k-1 的多项式。由于 race 不是有序因素变量，因此我们以 read 为例。首先，我们需要根据 read 创建一个有序的分类。

The complete cycle of missing value imputation followed by fitting the analysis model is repeated n_skip + 1 times and the analysis model parameters from the final fit are returned.
trans-unit.target: 重复缺失值插补的整个周期，然后拟合分析模型，重复 n_skip + 1 次，并返回来自最终拟合的分析模型参数。

trans-unit.source: The complex-step derivative has truncation error O(epsilon**2), so truncation error can be eliminated by choosing epsilon to be very small. The complex-step derivative avoids the problem of round-off error with small epsilon because there is no subtraction.
trans-unit.target: 复阶导数具有截断误差O(epsilon**2),所以选择epsilon非常小就可以消除截断误差。复阶导数由于没有减法,所以避免了小epsilon的整除误差问题。

trans-unit.source: The components are determined by minimizing the following quadratic loss function
trans-unit.target: 分量是通过最小化以下二次损失函数来确定的。

trans-unit.source: The concept of Granger-causality is described in chapter 7.6.3 of [1]. Test H0: “The variables in causing do not Granger-cause those in caused” against H1: “causing is Granger-causal for caused”.
trans-unit.target: Granger因果关系的概念在[1]的第7.6.3章中进行了描述。测试^ h 0 “中的变量 causing 不格兰杰原因而在 caused ”对^ h 1：“ causing 的格兰杰因果对于 caused ”。

trans-unit.source: The concept of instantaneous causality is described in chapters 3.6.3 and 7.6.4 of [1]. Test H0: “No instantaneous causality between the variables in caused and those in causing” against H1: “Instantaneous causality between caused and causing exists”. Note that instantaneous causality is a symmetric relation (i.e. if causing is “instantaneously causing” caused, then also caused is “instantaneously causing” causing), thus the naming of the parameters (which is chosen to be in accordance with test_granger_causality) may be misleading.
trans-unit.target: 瞬时因果关系的概念在[1]的 3.6.3和7.6.4章中进行了描述。测试^ h 0：“在变量之间没有因果关系瞬间 caused 那些在 causing 对H” 1：“瞬时之间的因果关系 caused ，并 causing 存在”。需要注意的是瞬时因果关系是对称关系（即，如果 causing 被“瞬间造成” caused ，则也 caused 被“瞬间造成” causing ），因此，参数的命名（其被选择为按照 test_granger_causality ）可能会产生误导。

trans-unit.source: The condition is now \(|\zeta_i| > 1\), where \(\zeta_i\) is a root of the polynomial with reversed coefficients and \(\lambda_i = \frac{1}{\zeta_i}\).
trans-unit.target: 现在的条件是\（| \ zeta_i |> 1 \），其中\（\ zeta_i \）是具有相反系数和\（\ lambda_i = \ frac {1} {\ zeta_i} \）的多项式的根。

trans-unit.source: The conditional means of random effects given the data.
trans-unit.target: 给定数据的随机效应的条件均值。

trans-unit.source: The confidence interval is based on Student’s t-distribution.
trans-unit.target: 置信区间基于学生的t分布。

trans-unit.source: The confidence interval is based on the Gaussian distribution.
trans-unit.target: 置信区间是基于高斯分布的。

trans-unit.source: The confidence interval is based on the standard normal distribution. Models wish to use a different distribution should overwrite this method.
trans-unit.target: 信心区间是基于标准正态分布的。模型希望使用不同的分布应覆盖此方法。

trans-unit.source: The confidence interval is obtained by inverting Z-tests. The limits of the confidence interval will always be observed event times.
trans-unit.target: 信度区间是通过倒置Z检验获得的。信度区间的极限将始终是观察到的事件时间。

trans-unit.source: The confidence intervals are clipped to be in the [0, 1] interval in the case of ‘normal’ and ‘agresti_coull’.
trans-unit.target: 在“正常”和“ agresti_coull”的情况下，置信区间被裁剪为[0，1]区间。

trans-unit.source: The constraints are of the form R params = q where R is the constraint_matrix and q is the vector of constraint_values.
trans-unit.target: 约束的形式为 R params = q ，其中R是constraint_matrix，q是constraint_values的向量。

trans-unit.source: The conventions of the arma_generate function require that we specify a 1 for the zero-lag of the AR and MA parameters and that the AR parameters be negated.
trans-unit.target: arma_generate函数的约定要求我们为AR和MA参数的零滞后指定1,并且AR参数要被否定。

trans-unit.source: The correlation between two observations in the same cluster is dep_params^distance, where dep_params contains the (scalar) autocorrelation parameter to be estimated, and distance is the distance between the two observations, calculated from their corresponding time values. time is stored as an n_obs x k matrix, where k represents the number of dimensions in the time index.
trans-unit.target: 同一聚类中两个观测值之间的相关性是dep_params ^ distance，其中 dep_params 包含要估计的（标量）自相关参数，而 distance 是两个观测值之间的距离，该距离是根据其对应的时间值计算得出的。 time 存储为n_obs xk矩阵，其中 k 表示时间索引中的维数。

trans-unit.source: The correlation matrix corrcoef can be given in 3 different ways If the multivariate normal is two-dimensional than only the correlation coefficient needs to be provided. For general dimension the correlation matrix can be provided either as a one-dimensional array of the upper triangular correlation coefficients stacked by rows, or as full square correlation matrix
trans-unit.target: 相关矩阵corrcoef可以以3种不同的方式给出 如果多变量正态是二维的,那么只需要提供相关系数。对于一般维度的相关矩阵,可以提供上三角相关系数按行叠加的一维数组,也可以提供全平方相关矩阵。

trans-unit.source: The covariance matrix for the score is based on the Hessian, i.e. observed information matrix or optionally on the expected information matrix..
trans-unit.target: 分数的协方差矩阵是基于黑森,即观察到的信息矩阵,也可以选择基于预期信息矩阵......。

trans-unit.source: The covariance structure is not updated as the fixed effects parameters are varied.
trans-unit.target: 随着固定效应参数的变化,协方差结构不会更新。

trans-unit.source: The covariates in exog, exog_re and exog_vc may (but need not) partially or wholly overlap.
trans-unit.target: exog ， exog_re 和 exog_vc 中的协变量可以（但不必）部分或全部重叠。

trans-unit.target: 当前算法需要O（N ** 2）个内存分配，因此可能不适用于非常大的数组（N> 10000）。

trans-unit.source: The current function value of the last printed optimization should be the critical value at the desired significance level. For alpha=.05, the value is 3.841459.
trans-unit.target: 最后一次打印优化的当前函数值应该是所需显著性水平下的临界值。对于alpha=.05,该值为3.841459。

trans-unit.source: The current implementation only supports independent random effects.
trans-unit.target: 目前的实现只支持独立随机效应。

trans-unit.source: The cycle is written as:

The cyclical component is intended to capture cyclical effects at time frames much longer than captured by the seasonal component. For example, in economics the cyclical term is often intended to capture the business cycle, and is then expected to have a period between "1.5 and 12 years" (see Durbin and Koopman).
trans-unit.target: 周期性部分旨在捕捉比季节性部分所捕捉的时间框架长得多的周期性影响。例如,在经济学中,周期性的术语往往是为了反映商业周期,然后预期有一个 "1.5年至12年 "的周期(见Durbin和Koopman)。

trans-unit.source: The cyclical component is intended to capture cyclical effects at time frames much longer than captured by the seasonal component. For example, in economics the cyclical term is often intended to capture the business cycle, and is then expected to have a period between “1.5 and 12 years” (see Durbin and Koopman).
trans-unit.target: 周期性成分旨在在比季节性成分捕获的时间长得多的时间范围内捕获周期性影响。例如，在经济学中，周期性术语通常意在捕捉经济周期，然后预期其周期为“ 1.5至12年”（参见Durbin和Koopman）。

trans-unit.source: The default is simple_differencing=False, in which case the integration component is implemented as part of the state space formulation, and all of the original data can be used in estimation.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 simple_differencing=False ，在这种情况下，集成组件被实现为状态空间公式的一部分，并且所有原始数据都可以用于估计。

trans-unit.source: The default memory conservation method is MEMORY_STORE_ALL, so that all intermediate matrices are stored.
trans-unit.target: 默认的内存保留方法是 MEMORY_STORE_ALL ，以便存储所有中间矩阵。
